name: DiceShift (xeyos)
description:
Game Designed & Developed by Eros Cebreiro & Luis Alberto Carril for the GMTK Jam 2022.

Instructions:

There are a number of different biomes, characters, and enemies in the game and you can switch at any moment.. given that you have at least 20 energy to perform this jump, you will also lose HP on that jump if you do not have enough energy.

You can extract energy on any biome, up to 40 stacks (2 d20 dices), but it takes some time to extract it, and when attacked they turn to a random number between the current and 1. Once Reached 20, the extractors get damage ressistance and cannot be stealed anymore.

In this game, you activate and defend the extractors and jump to another level if the one you are on is getting too dangerous. Upon a jump, the next level, character, and energy extraction times will be selected on a dice roll and you will lose 20 energy and/or HP. Any remaining energy will be swapped into HP for the next level.

Every time you make a jump, new enemies will appear.. even though we didn't have the time to make them really scary... next time, maybe.

All Art used in the game was licensed out of the team.
